pullrequest.title: Fix build for use with hydro

content.raw:
The following list of packages works for me:
~~~
ros-hydro-actionlib
ros-hydro-cmake-modules
ros-hydro-control_msgs
ros-hydro-convex-decomposition
ros-hydro-image-transport
ros-hydro-ivcon
ros-hydro-nav-msgs
ros-hydro-pr2-controller-manager
ros-hydro-ros
ros-hydro-rosbuild
ros-hydro-tf
ros-hydro-trajectory_msgs
ros-hydro-urdfdom
ros-hydro-xacro
~~~
I would also recommend the patch in f735f86 (branch drcsim_hyrdo_compat_scpeters), which gives an improved error message about missing ROS_ROOT on hydro (see [this ros answers post](http://answers.ros.org/question/78996/partial-hydro-install-missing-ros_root-variable/)) and a more complete dependency list in the atlas_msgs manifest.

EDIT: there's also a couple run-time dependencies not in the list above:
~~~
ros-hydro-nodelet-topic-tools
ros-hydro-robot-state-publisher
ros-hydro-stereo-image-proc
~~~
